amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds in the bill from being used to enforce restrictions on remittances made to Cuban nationals or Cuban households.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in the bill to enforce any restrictions on remittances from the United States to nationals of Cuba or Cuban households.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delahunt amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 196 (Roll no. 484).
